question:
Write a letter to your friend to ask him/her to develop a website for your business. In your letter:


Give a brief description of the business
Mention what you’d like to be there on the website
Provide some ideas on use of images on the web site.
text: I hope this letter finds you well. I am writing this letter a great pride to inform you about my new software consulting business at our place. As part of this, I look after all service-related issues including hardware as well. However, there will be an additional charge for any hardware replacement or installation.

As you heard, I am seeking  help to develop a brand new website for my business operations. Having said that, it should be a phenomenal view and mesmerizing design by looking at the options like prices,services, and contact information along with other consulting suggestions too.

Undoubtedly, I strongly believe that we must use a few breathtaking sceneries and mind-blowing designs from different existing sources such as Google and Facebook applications.In addition, you can refer to any other designs if you think they are the best in the industry. Last but not the least, why do not you check with your friends on the same?
I look forward to seeing a mind-blowing website and I cannot wait to see our business  success.
